_comment: Template for domain-specific configuration. Copy this file to domain-config.json and fill in values for your research domain. See Vibe Science v6.0 Blueprint Section 10A.3 for details.

literature._comment_primary: Main databases for this domain. These are checked first and are REQUIRED for L-1+ gate.
literature._comment_secondary: Supplementary databases for broader coverage and cross-referencing.
literature._comment_datasets: Data repositories specific to this domain (e.g., GEO for genomics, Materials Project for materials science).
literature._comment_preprints: Preprint servers relevant to this domain.
literature._comment_grey: Grey literature sources (reports, theses, patents). Leave empty if not applicable.
literature._comment_curated_rag: Local RAG solution for curated literature. Options: 'zotero', 'paperqa2', 'notebooklm', or null.

rag_config._comment: Configuration for the selected curated_rag solution. Only needed if curated_rag is not null.

dq1._comment: Data Quality Gate 1: domain-specific thresholds. Customize for your domain.
